title: Most Exclisuve Vehicles
desc: The most expensive car in the world officially is the Bugatti La Voiture Noire. With a price tag of $18.7 million after taxes, the one-off Bugatti La Voiture Noire is officially the priciest new car ever.

title: Quick Time Response
desc: A quick time event is a method of context-sensitive gameplay in which the player performs actions on the control device shortly after the appearance of an on-screen instruction/prompt

title: Everywhere Anytime
desc: Ubiquitous comes to us from the noun ubiquity, meaning presence everywhere or in many places simultaneously.Ubiquity first appeared in print in the late 16th century, but ubiquitous.
